name: Living in Limbo: Prologue
description:
Living in Limbo is a short visual novel filled with creepy cute monster girls. It's the prologue  episode for a series of visual novels I plan to work on set in this universe.

You follow Nai the succubus as she demonstrates how a demons work in this strange place, guiding lost souls to a place called 'The Pillar'. 

This is my first completed VN, I had worked on some in the past but none of them made it through development. This project was a little challenge to myself to see if i could develop a small game within a week and i'm relieved to say it all worked! 

Thank you for checking out my game! Expect more in the near future.
